content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_DimCustomer
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO wwi.DimCustomer
(CustomerKey 1, WWICustomerID 2, Customer 3, BillToCustomer 4, Category 5, BuyingGroup 6, PrimaryContact 7, PostalCode 8, ValidFrom 9, ValidTo 10, LineageKey 11)
FROM 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/WWI/wwi-dimcustomer_original.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIELDQUOTE = '"'
	,FIELDTERMINATOR = '|'
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://synapsedemos.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM wwi.DimCustomer
GO
